transform_def.name: refraction_cube
transform_def.string: let a = sinh(p_in.x / p_in.y) * weight b = cosh(p_in.y / p_in.x) * weight x1 = (a * p_in.x * (unit_rnd_0) / halfpi()) * 2 x2 = (a * p_in.y * (unit_rnd_1) / halfpi()) * x1 x3 = (x1 * x2) * (p_in.x / pi()) y1 = (b * p_in.x * (unit_rnd_0) / quartpi()) * 2 y2 = (b * p_in.y * (unit_rnd_1) / quartpi()) * y1 y3 = (y1 * y2) * (p_in.y / pi()) in mat2x2(cos(x1 * x3), sin(y1 * y3), cos(x2 * x3), sin(y2 * y3)) * vec2(weight)
